header.title: Share On - Update from 2.1.1 to 2.2.0
header.description:
With Share On MOD, users can share the topics in the following social networks: - Facebook - Twitter - Digg - Reddit - Orkut - Delicious - VK - Tuenti - Sonico - Friendfeed - Tumblr - Google+
You can follow the development through the repository: http://goo.gl/zGvsP
** FEATURES ** - ACP module to manage the MOD. - Each button can be enabled/disabled individually. - Buttons position. - Check version: displays when a new version is available.
header.author-notes: If you want to contribute to the development of this MOD, consider making a donation visiting: http://goo.gl/erGPa
